title: How Black Women Saw Ketanji Brown Jackson’s Supreme Court Confirmation Hearing - The New York Times
content:
1. How Black Women Saw Ketanji Brown Jackson’s Supreme Court Confirmation Hearing  The New York Times
  2. Ketanji Brown Jackson is Wrong About Roe v. Wade | Opinion  Newsweek
  3. Manchin backs Biden Supreme Court nominee Ketanji Brown Jackson  Fox News
  4. Opinion | Hugh Hewitt: My takeaways from the Jackson confirmation hearings  The Washington Post
  5. The disrespect Ketanji Brown Jackson faced was intentional — and all too common | Helen Ubiñas  The Philadelphia Inquirer
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Watching the Supreme Court nominee was a major moment, but her treatment by Republican senators felt all too familiar. “Every Black woman speaks that language,” one woman said.
